data.text:
A few days after forming a provisional 
contract with Tamamo Cross-
data.processed:
󠁿A few days after forming a provisional 
󠁿contract with Tamamo Cross-

data.text: -Fuu. Time?
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed: 󠁿-Fuu. Time?

data.text:
Alright!! Even after that run, 
I still got gas in the tank… lookin' good, huh?!
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
󠁿Alright!! Even after that run, 
󠁿I still got gas in the tank… lookin' good, huh?!

data.text:
Due to the frantic training she's been doing lately, it seems 
like she's truly growing stronger. If she's doing this well, she 
should probably try another real race…

choices.text: How about trying out a mock race?
How about trying out a mock race?

data.processed:
󠁿Due to the frantic training she's been doing lately, it seems 
󠁿like she's truly growing stronger. If she's doing this well, she 
󠁿should probably try another real race…

data.text:
Testin' out my power before th' Selection Race? 
Bring it on! I wanna see how far I've come!
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
󠁿Testin' out my power before th' Selection Race? 
󠁿Bring it on! I wanna see how far I've come!

data.text:
The way Tamamo Cross is now, she'll win for sure. 
That way we can head in to the Selection Race with momentum.
data.processed:
󠁿The way Tamamo Cross is now, she'll win for sure. 
󠁿That way we can head in to the Selection Race with momentum.

data.text: That's what I thought, but-
data.processed: 󠁿That's what I thought, but-

data.text:
Win… Win… Win…! 
I need ta win, right here, right now…!
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
󠁿Win… Win… Win…! 
󠁿I need ta win, right here, right now…!

data.text:
We're almost at the final stretch! The lead isn't changing! 
Is there an Uma Musume that can pull away?!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
󠁿We're almost at the final stretch! The lead isn't changing! 
󠁿Is there an Uma Musume that can pull away?!

data.text:
Damnit… why…?! My legs feel heavy…! 
Even though… I wanna win this…!
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
󠁿Damnit… why…?! My legs feel heavy…! 
󠁿Even though… I wanna win this…!

data.text:
Tamamo Cross was able to catch up but can't pull ahead! 
Is it already too late?! The lead isn't changing! It's over!!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
󠁿Tamamo Cross was able to catch up but can't pull ahead! 
󠁿Is it already too late?! The lead isn't changing! It's over!!

data.text:
Tamamo Cross' mock race that was supposed to be just warm-up, 
ended with a bitter also-ran result.
data.processed:
󠁿Tamamo Cross' mock race that was supposed to be just warm-up, 
󠁿ended with a bitter also-ran result.

data.text: Why… why do I keep havin' these pathetic results…!?
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed: 󠁿Why… why do I keep havin' these pathetic results…!?

data.text:
…Sorry. Let's call it a day. 
I need ta go cool my head…
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
󠁿…Sorry. Let's call it a day. 
󠁿I need ta go cool my head…

data.text:
Tamamo Cross being unable to display her full 
power, there has to be a reason for it. I was 
walking alone while thinking this, when-
data.processed:
󠁿Tamamo Cross being unable to display her full 
󠁿power, there has to be a reason for it. I was 
󠁿walking alone while thinking this, when-

data.text:
Before I realized it, I was at the park where I 
first met Tamamo Cross. Even now, it was still 
filled with the sounds of children playing.
data.processed:
󠁿Before I realized it, I was at the park where I 
󠁿first met Tamamo Cross. Even now, it was still 
󠁿filled with the sounds of children playing.

data.text: -Tama-oneechan! Over here!
data.name: Girl A
data.processed: 󠁿-Tama-oneechan! Over here!

data.text: C'mon, hurry!
data.name: Boy A
data.processed: 󠁿C'mon, hurry!

data.text:
Geez, I told ya I didn't come here ta play! 
Really, whenever ya see me, ya just come a runnin'-
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
󠁿Geez, I told ya I didn't come here ta play! 
󠁿Really, whenever ya see me, ya just come a runnin'-

data.text: Ah…
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed: 󠁿Ah…

data.text:
…This park, it's a lot like th' one back home. That's why… 
whenever I'm feelin' a little blue… I end up here…
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
󠁿…This park, it's a lot like th' one back home. That's why… 
󠁿whenever I'm feelin' a little blue… I end up here…

data.text: Tama-neechan? What're you doing-?
data.name: Boy A
data.processed: 󠁿Tama-neechan? What're you doing-?

data.text:
Ah- I got it, I got it! I've gotta talk to this guy first! 
Jus' play with each other fer now!
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
󠁿Ah- I got it, I got it! I've gotta talk to this guy first! 
󠁿Jus' play with each other fer now!

data.text:
…they're about th' same age as the brats- 
my siblings, back home.
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
󠁿…they're about th' same age as the brats- 
󠁿my siblings, back home.

data.text:
…Wonder if they're doin' okay. 
Dad and Mom too… hopefully they're doin' well too…
data.name: Tamamo Cross

choices.text: You care alot about your family, huh?
You care alot about your family, huh?

data.processed:
󠁿…Wonder if they're doin' okay. 
󠁿Dad and Mom too… hopefully they're doin' well too…

data.text:
…They're important. 
More than anythin'-
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
󠁿…They're important. 
󠁿More than anythin'-

data.text:
My family, ya see… we're broke. 
But, with everyone smilin' happily, every day was fun.
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
󠁿My family, ya see… we're broke. 
󠁿But, with everyone smilin' happily, every day was fun.

data.text:
But… Dad and Mom, ta make sure we had enough ta eat, worked 
themselves ta the bone… I wanted ta help 'em out.
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
󠁿But… Dad and Mom, ta make sure we had enough ta eat, worked 
󠁿themselves ta the bone… I wanted ta help 'em out.

data.text:
Neene- Tama-neene-! 
Let's buy some candy~. I'm really hungry~.
data.name: Tamamo's Little Brother
data.processed:
󠁿Neene- Tama-neene-! 
󠁿Let's buy some candy~. I'm really hungry~.

data.text:
No way, bein' wasteful ain't good. 'sides tonight's special is… 
hanpen steak! Gotta make sure yer not full, so ya can enjoy it!
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
󠁿No way, bein' wasteful ain't good. 'sides tonight's special is… 
󠁿hanpen steak! Gotta make sure yer not full, so ya can enjoy it!

data.text: Waa! Tama-neene's hanpen steak!
data.name: Tamamo's Little Sister
data.processed: 󠁿Waa! Tama-neene's hanpen steak!

data.text: Yaaay-! Neene! I'll wait until we get home then-!
data.name: Tamamo's Little Brother
data.processed: 󠁿Yaaay-! Neene! I'll wait until we get home then-!

data.text:
Oh, how admirable! C'mon, 
Dad and Mom are waitin' at home, let's get goin'!
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
󠁿Oh, how admirable! C'mon, 
󠁿Dad and Mom are waitin' at home, let's get goin'!

data.text:
(…Jus' wait. Buyin' candy, fillin' yer bellies with real 
steak… someday I'm gonna make tha' come true.)
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
󠁿(…Jus' wait. Buyin' candy, fillin' yer bellies with real 
󠁿steak… someday I'm gonna make tha' come true.)

data.text:
-I thought 'bout it alot. 'Bout what I could do ta make life 
easier for 'em. An' it finally hit me… th' Twinkle Series.
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
󠁿-I thought 'bout it alot. 'Bout what I could do ta make life 
󠁿easier for 'em. An' it finally hit me… th' Twinkle Series.

data.text:
Win a whole buncha races, get famous as th' best in Japan. 
Doin' that, fer sure, would make life easier for 'em.
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
󠁿Win a whole buncha races, get famous as th' best in Japan. 
󠁿Doin' that, fer sure, would make life easier for 'em.

data.text:
'Cuz they helped me get ta Tracen Academy, I can't go on losin'! 
It ain't good if I can't win! But even then-
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
󠁿'Cuz they helped me get ta Tracen Academy, I can't go on losin'! 
󠁿It ain't good if I can't win! But even then-

data.text:
Right now, I ain't done nothin' but lose a buncha times. 
Startin' ta feel a lil' stupid… kinda depressin'.
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
󠁿Right now, I ain't done nothin' but lose a buncha times. 
󠁿Startin' ta feel a lil' stupid… kinda depressin'.

data.text: -Tama-oneechan, are you okay?
data.name: Girl A
data.processed: 󠁿-Tama-oneechan, are you okay?

data.text:
Oh, what's up? Ya came back? 
Didn't I tell ya to go play with th' others?
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
󠁿Oh, what's up? Ya came back? 
󠁿Didn't I tell ya to go play with th' others?

data.text:
But, we wanna see Tama-neechan run! 
Show us again!
data.name: Boy A
data.processed:
󠁿But, we wanna see Tama-neechan run! 
󠁿Show us again!

data.text:
Geez, yer really rough on yer Uma Musume ain't ya? 
Guess it can't be helped, I'll show ya jus' a bit, so step back!
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
󠁿Geez, yer really rough on yer Uma Musume ain't ya? 
󠁿Guess it can't be helped, I'll show ya jus' a bit, so step back!

data.text: Here I go~… -Fuu!!
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed: 󠁿Here I go~… -Fuu!!

data.text:
She ran as if to cut through the evening sky. 
She was running with the same quickness as the 
first time I saw her, like "lightning".
data.processed:
󠁿She ran as if to cut through the evening sky. 
󠁿She was running with the same quickness as the 
󠁿first time I saw her, like "lightning".

data.text:
No way~!! Tama-neechan, you got a lot faster!! 
You looked super strong!
data.name: Boy A
data.processed:
󠁿No way~!! Tama-neechan, you got a lot faster!! 
󠁿You looked super strong!

data.text: And, Tama-oneechan looked like she was having fun~!
data.name: Girl A
data.processed: 󠁿And, Tama-oneechan looked like she was having fun~!

data.text: Got that right! That's- the "White Lightning" for ya!
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed: 󠁿Got that right! That's- the "White Lightning" for ya!

data.text:
…A long time ago, Dad used ta say that while I was runnin'. 
[Faster and havin' more fun than anyone, yer just like "White 
Lightning", Tama] she'd say.
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
󠁿…A long time ago, Dad used ta say that while I was runnin'. 
󠁿[Faster and havin' more fun than anyone, yer just like "White 
󠁿Lightning", Tama] she'd say.

data.text:
Everyone back home, believes that "White Lightning" will be th' 
best in Japan. Tha' feelin'… I don't wanna disappoint 'em.
data.name: Tamamo Cross

choices.text: (Having more fun than anyone… running faster-)
choices.processed: <size=34>(Having more fun than anyone… running faster-)</size>

data.processed:
󠁿Everyone back home, believes that "White Lightning" will be th' 
󠁿best in Japan. Tha' feelin'… I don't wanna disappoint 'em.

data.text:
At that moment, one possibility as to why Tamamo Cross couldn't 
realize her full power floated to the front of my mind…
data.processed:
󠁿At that moment, one possibility as to why Tamamo Cross couldn't 
󠁿realize her full power floated to the front of my mind…
